name: Koris
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, Koris has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Koris scores against a {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Koris is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Koris instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Koris deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Koris that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Koris doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
